DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Single Material
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a single material name that defines the material of the element construction.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material Layer Set
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a material layer set, consisting of a set of material layers with thickness and material name that defines the material of the element construction.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material Layer Usage
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of the assignment of a material layer set to the element reference axis or reference plane (with an offset). The alignment and thickness of the material layer set has to be consistent along the axis or parallel to the plane.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material List
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Provision of a list of material name that defines the different materials of the element construction.

NOTE: There is no correspondence of the parts or components of the element construction and the materials within the material list.

DEPRECATION: The Material List will be deprecated in IFC4.
